review: There is minimum wait time if going on a weekday. Dr is fine, only thing is he seemed in a bit of a hurry and was not listening to all my points. He did all tests and gave me suggestions, the clinic has all equipments. Overall it was okay experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My dad had open heart surgery in 2018 in a reputed hospital. However his discomforts started developing day by day and it become worsen within 3 years. Nothing changed after so many follow-ups with in the same hospital spending thousands of money in our each visit. 

Finally my dad felt it is not worth going to hospitals and decided with live with the pain for his rest of life. 

Since my dad is not so comfort going to the same hospital again. I thought of taking a second opinion. I found Dr Natraj Shetty in Practo app and my appointment was fixed on Saturday. 

While our appointment was at 7 we reached the clinic around 6:30 and the hospital was so clean and tidy and the staffs in the clinic is very nice and helpful. 

Finally we met the doctor for the first time, he is really an amazing person. He has gone through the complete medical history thoroughly and ensured ECG and ECO test done immediately ( where earlier we used to spend half day in the big hospital to get this test done).  While the eco test was done. Doctor directly come to ECO testing place and analysed the heart conditions. 

After all the test Doctor politely explained about my dad health condition and suggested the further treatment procedures. 

Finally on Monday(within 2 days) my dad gone through the angioplasty procedure with the support of Dr Natraj Shetty sir and gods grace my dad is fit and fine now. 

The biggest surprise where I have never experienced iny lifetime is that the doctor had call me personally and enquired about my dad's health condition which really gives me lots of confident and I really appreciate him for his morality

A big thanks to Dr Natraj Shetty sir.

Very professional approach by the doctor.  Went for a check up since I had chest pain. He did an ECG, ECHO and TMT and reassured me that my heart is fine. I am very happy with the doctor.  His support staff especially Nanditha are also excellent.  Also need to add that his fees and other charges are reasonable.  Highly recommended.

Doctor was very friendly and caring. I took my dad for consultation after coronary angiogram which was suggested by the same doctor. He ensured all the procedures are done properly and explained in detail about the whole process very patiently. Thank you doctor.

I suggested that the pain is in sternum and not in heart but he insisted on all expensive tests for heart and it cost us 5000. After ECG, he said everything is fine but then said let‚Äôs have one other test. It was for 2000 and after it came out normal, he asked for one more test. Cost of tests were told at the time of billing only.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had consulted Dr. Nataraja setty for High BP(Hypertension). Before consulting him I had to rush to my nearby Multispecialty emergency room for High BP 180/120 in midnight, but in that emergency  clinic they made me to panic more & didn't properly diagnose my problem. Based on my Brother in law's suggestion, I immediately consulted Dr. Nataraja setty next day. He was cool, composed & listened patiently regarding my High BP problem. He made me comfortable & diagnosed my problem, did an immediate ECHO & ECG to make sure everything with my Heart is ok & provided correct medication & suggested me to make dietary changes & maintain healthy lifestyle. After consulting him my High BP has come to normal condition & iam back to my normal routine. He doesn't suggest unnecessary medications, tests & above all he makes patient comfortable with his friendliness & calmness. He is One of the finest leading Cardiologist in Bangalore & iam grateful to him for his diagnosis & advice. Thank you sir.
reply_text: Thank you so much for u r valuable Mr.Sandeep.üòä

review: I just visited doctor for preventive "heart checkup" due to some acidity related pain(which I came to know later). Doctor is very friendly. All the tests were done on the same day itself. Supporting staff is also awesome . Doctor visit and all the tests including report analysis were completed within 90 minutes max . It was altogether an awesome experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: So so better after consulting doctor natraj sir as per his guidance under his supervision my father underwent angioplasty and his condition has been improved very much his patience his confidence and the way doctor treats and explains is so much good that even before any treatment the patient feels so better many many thanks to the doctor
reply_text: Thank so much.
